line1.text: Jake: Dad taught us everything about exploring! Mom wouldn't let us go with him on his trips, so we had our own adventures right in our backyard.

line2.text: Jake: It never got boring being with Roy and Emily.

line1.text: Jake: But they got older, and we stopped having adventures. Most of the time they were busy.

line2.text: Jake: Even though I'm scared now, I'm having fun spending time with Roy and Emily again.
